name: system
description: System-level actions for macOS. These enable launching, controlling, and automating system behaviour, applications, files, and peripherals.

actions.name: list_apps
actions.description: Returns a list of installed apps in /Applications.

actions.name: list_files
actions.description: Returns all files and folders in the specified directory.

actions.name: get_system_info
actions.description: Returns basic macOS info like hostname and OS version.

actions.name: list_usb_devices
actions.description: List all connected USB devices using system_profiler.

actions.name: list_displays
actions.description: List connected displays and resolution info using system_profiler.

actions.name: list_printers
actions.description: List installed printers using lpstat.

actions.name: write_file
actions.description: Writes text content to the specified file path.

actions.name: delete_file
actions.description: Deletes the file at the specified path.

actions.name: copy_file
actions.description: Copies a file from src to dst.

actions.name: move_file
actions.description: Moves or renames a file from src to dst.

actions.name: open_url
actions.description: Open a URL in the specified browser.

actions.name: open_browser
actions.description: Launch the specified browser application.

actions.name: close_browser
actions.description: Quit the specified browser application using AppleScript.

actions.name: lock_screen
actions.description: Locks the screen using macOS keyboard shortcut via AppleScript.

actions.name: take_screenshot
actions.description: Take a screenshot of the screen and save it to the specified path.

actions.name: launch_app
actions.description: Launch an installed application by name using the macOS open command.

actions.name: quit_app
actions.description: Quit an application by name using AppleScript.

actions.name: say_text
actions.description: Use the macOS voice synthesiser to speak the provided text.

actions.name: set_volume
actions.description: Set the system volume level (0â€“10) using AppleScript.

actions.name: sleep_system
actions.description: Put the Mac to sleep using AppleScript.

actions.name: restart_system
actions.description: Restart the Mac immediately (requires elevated permissions).

actions.name: shutdown_system
actions.description: Shut down the Mac immediately (requires elevated permissions).

actions.name: get_user_info
actions.description: Returns the current macOS user's username, home directory, and full name.

actions.name: get_ip_address
actions.description: Returns the device's local IP address and hostname.

actions.name: get_current_shell
actions.description: Returns the current shell being used (e.g., /bin/zsh).

actions.name: get_uptime
actions.description: Returns the system uptime from the 'uptime' command.

actions.name: get_logged_in_users
actions.description: Returns a list of users currently logged into the system.

actions.name: refresh_apps
actions.description: Scans the /Applications folder and regenerates the app list file.
